sentences.sCn: 你不能叫这种东西肉汁吧？

sentences.sContent: You have spilled gravy on the tablecloth.
sentences.sCn: 你把肉汁泼到台布上了。

sentences.sContent: They will even pour gravy on your sandwiches if you let them.
sentences.sCn: 如果你愿意的话，他们甚至会给你的三明治浇上肉汁。

synos.tran: 肉汁；不法利润；轻易得来的钱

phrases.pCn: 调味汁瓶；酱油壶；船形调味肉汁盘

trans.tranOther: a sauce made from the juice that comes from meat as it cooks, mixed with flour and water
